content: sign up for my **mailing list** 1 to receive news and exclusive offers -introduction celebrated on the 15th day of the 8th lunar month the mid-autumn festival is a beloved holiday across east and southeast asia it s all about family reunions giving thanks and enjoying the harvest season as a taiwanese-korean-american i ve always looked forward to one thing mooncakes these rich round pastries come with sweet or savory fillings like mung bean or salted egg yolk and symbolize unity and togetherness pro-tip they re best enjoyed with a warm cup of tea -this pdf pattern is available in english only in us terminology -this is a digital item you will not receive a physical item in the mail -difficulty intermediate+ -measurements 2 5 in 6 35 cm in diameter -follow me on instagram ** @curiouspapaya 2 ** for the latest updates 1 https //view flodesk com/pages/63d4ba29de520bd60dc33f80 2 https //www instagram com/curiouspapaya
